alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 11:10PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harrison and southeastern Hancock Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1110 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bay St. Louis, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, St. Martin, D`iberville, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier, Latimer and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 47. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
